items.name: Object_Message
items.content: # =================================================================== # # Script: Object_Message # # $$COPYRIGHT$$ # # =================================================================== class MessageSettings ###* * Stores the different kind of settings for a message object such as * auto-erase, wait-at-end, backlog writing, etc. * * @module ui * @class MessageSettings * @memberof ui * @constructor ### constructor: -> ###* * The domain the object belongs to. * @property domain * @type string ### @domain = "com.degica.vnm.default" ###* * Indicates if the message should wait for user-action to continue. * @property waitAtEnd * @type boolean * @default true ### @waitAtEnd = yes ###* * Indicates if the message should automatically erase it's content * before displaying the next message. * @property autoErase * @type boolean * @default true ### @autoErase = yes ###* * Indicates if the message should be added to the backlog. * @property backlog * @type boolean * @default true ### @backlog = yes ###* * Spacing between text lines in pixels. * @property lineSpacing * @type number * @default 0 ### @lineSpacing = 0 ###* * Left and right padding of a text line in pixels. * @property linePadding * @type number * @default 6 ### @linePadding = 6 ###* * Spacing between text paragraphs in pixels. A paragraph is a single * message added if the autoErase property is off. * @property paragraphSpacing * @type number * @default 0 ### @paragraphSpacing = 0 ###* * Indicates if the defined text-color of the currently speaking character should * be used as message text color. That is useful for NVL style messages. * @property useCharacterColor * @type boolean * @default false ### @useCharacterColor = no ui.MessageSettings = MessageSettings class Object_Message extends ui.Object_UIElement @objectCodecBlackList = ["parent", "controlsByStyle", "parentsByStyle", "styles", "activeStyles"] ###* * A message object to display game messages on screen. * * @module ui * @class Object_Message * @extends ui.Object_UIElement * @memberof ui * @constructor ### constructor: -> super @visible = no ###* * The font used for the message text. * @property font * @type gs.Font ### @font = new Font("Verdana", Math.round(9 / 240 * Graphics.height)) @font.border = no @font.borderColor = new Color(0, 0, 0) ###* * Message specific settings such as auto-erase, wait-at-end, etc. * @property settings * @type ui.MessageSettings ### @settings = new ui.MessageSettings() ###* * All message paragraphs * @property messages * @type Object[] ### @messages = [] ###* * The text-renderer used to render the message text. * @property textRenderer * @type gs.Component_MessageTextRenderer ### @textRenderer = new gs.Component_MessageTextRenderer() ###* * The UI object's animator-component to execute different kind of animations like move, rotate, etc. on it. * @property animator * @type gs.Component_Animator ### @animator = new gs.Animator() ###* * The UI object's source rectangle on screen. * @property srcRect * @type gs.Rect ### @srcRect = new Rect(0, 0, 1, 1) @message = new vn.Component_MessageBehavior() ###* * The UI object's component to add message-specific behavior. * @property behavior * @type vn.Component_MessageBehavior ### @behavior = @message @addComponent(@animator) @addComponent(@textRenderer) @addComponent(@message) ###* * Restores the object from a data-bundle. * * @method restore * @param {Object} data - The data-bundle. ### restore: (data) -> super(data) @font = new Font(data.font.name, data.font.size) @font.restore(data.font) @dstRect.width = data.width @dstRect.height = data.height ###* * Serializes the object into a data-bundle. * * @method toDataBundle * @return {Object} The data-bundle. ### toDataBundle: -> bundle = super() bundle.font = @font.toDataBundle() bundle.width = @dstRect.width bundle.height = @dstRect.height return bundle ui.Object_Message = Object_Message
